code: import React,{useState}from'react';import CurrentWeather from'../components/CurrentWeather';import Hourlyforecast from'../components/Hourlyforecast';import Dailyforecast from'../components/Dailyforecast';import'./Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const api={key:'b1e1d660348fd1a49f685e5d062e6269',base:"https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/"};const[Location,setLocation]=useState("");const[weatherData,setWeatherData]=useState(null);const[ForecastData,setForecastData]=useState(null);const handleLocationChange=event=>{setLocation(event.target.value);};const handleSearch=()=>{fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${Location}&units=metric&appid=b1e1d660348fd1a49f685e5d062e6269`).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setWeatherData(data));fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/forecast?q=${Location}&units=metric&appid=b1e1d660348fd1a49f685e5d062e6269`).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setForecastData(data));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Weather Forecast"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",onChange:handleLocationChange,placeholder:"Enter your location"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"search-btn",onClick:handleSearch,children:"Search"}),weatherData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CurrentWeather,{weatherData:weatherData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Hourlyforecast,{forecastData:ForecastData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dailyforecast,{forecastData:ForecastData})]})]});};export default Home;
